ygData.subject: Re: Rarely mentioned fact...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh, I am rarely invited along for FGs - I m usually helping some poor newbies or roaming the countryside.  Lately, I ve been in the Planes every day and
ygData.messageBody:
> We do it in a totally diffrent way, and I thought Harmonic and
> people he hunt giants with used this tactic to. (since we play
> on the same server). Our enchanters charm 1 giant each and let
> them along with everyone else kill the 3:rd giant. Then we let
> one go and kill him and keep the other one charmed.
> Then finally we take the last one.

Heh, I am rarely invited along for FGs - I'm usually helping some
poor newbies or roaming the countryside. Lately, I've been in
the Planes every day and when I don't do that I'm playing my
druid. The last time someone charmed a fire giant, all hell broke
loose.

A fire giant warrior says 'You will not evade me Lord_Nagafen00'

POOF... Naggie appears from no where. heh. /shiver

Harmonic.
